description: The wind is howling, and the snow looks like it isn't going to let up anytime soon. Sounds like the perfect time to pull on a pair of their Men's Merino Sport Fleece Wind Tights and head out to train. A windproof front panel and DWR weather protection finish help you stay warm and protected from harsh conditions, while reflective elements help increase visibility in low-light situations—making these pants great for setting new goals as you cruise past your soon-to-be-old PR this winter.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport Fleece Wind Tights - Mens
